roleset.name: prosper, do well
roleset.note: FLOURISH-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls exist-47.1-1, gorge-39.6. (from flourish.01-v)

example.name: usual usage
example.text: Back when the Burgess fauna were flourishing, it seems, human evolutionary hopes hung on the survival of a little worm with a backbone called Pikaia.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Not least , they operated without the need to support their prejudices or delusions in authentic high - level debate , flourishing in their members - only domains of the Pentagon , the NSC Staff , and the State Department , enjoying exclusive channels of communication to the White House controlled by Cheney , and unchallenged under a President of uniquely closed mind .
example.arg: in their members - only domains of the Pentagon , the NSC Staff , and the State Department
